duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, understanding their business needs, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
Identify new business opportunities, create strategic plans for growth, and drive sales initiatives to achieve revenue targets.
Develop and execute sales strategies to maximize market penetration and revenue generation, particularly in the IT and software sectors.
Possess a comprehensive understanding of our IT solutions and software services, and effectively communicate their value to potential clients.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, competitor activities, and market dynamics to identify opportunities and threats.
Collaborate with our technical teams to align customer needs with product development and ensure successful project delivery.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date sales reports, forecasts, and pipeline data.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Marketing, IT, or a related field
